metadata.description: Region in which the resource group and components will be deployed
The base URI where artifacts required by this template are located including a trailing '/'

The sasToken required to access _artifactsLocation.  When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a sasToken will be automatically generated. Use the defaultValue if the staging location is not secured.
Cluster prefix. Used to generate cluster hostnames. Maximum of 20 characters.
Address prefix of the new virtual network
CIDR used for the management subnet - needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix
CIDR used for the application subnet - needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix
CIDR used for the AD subnet - needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix
CIDR used for the data subnet - needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix
CIDR used for the Redis subnet - needs to be a subset of the addressPrefix
Size of Datadisk in GB for ES hosting VMs.
Number of Remote Desktop Gateway nodes
Location of license key file for Enterprise Server.
The fully qualified domain name (FQDN), e.g., example.com. Must be 2-255 characters.
The password for the machine and domain administrator account.
Administrator username for service account user.
Flag to determine whether fileshare demo is deployed
Size of Datadisk in GB for FS hosting VMs.
Flag to determine whether PAC demo is deployed
Flag to determine whether database demo is deployed
Ip address for SQL Load Balancer
Flag to determine whether linux VMs are deployed for ES.

variables.subnets: [concat(variables('baseSubnetArr'), if(variables('deployEsLb'), variables('dataSubnetArr'), json('[]')), if(parameters('deployPacDemo'), variables('redisSubnetArr'), json('[]')))]
